dcterms:creator: Thomas N. Kipf
Max Welling
dcterms:description: Cora is a citation network dataset where nodes represent papers and edges represent citations between them. The features are bag-of-words representations of the paper titles, and the labels are the categories of the papers.
dcterms:title: Cora

dcterms:creator: Thomas N. Kipf
Max Welling
dcterms:description: Citeseer is a citation network dataset similar to Cora, where nodes are papers and edges are citations. The features are bag-of-words representations of the paper titles, and the labels are the categories of the papers.
dcterms:title: Citeseer

dcterms:creator: Jun Wu
Jingrui He
Jiejun Xu
dcterms:description: Air-USA is a dataset representing the air traffic network in the USA, where nodes are airports and edges represent commercial flights between them. The labels are generated based on the activity measured by people and flights passing through the airports.
dcterms:title: Air-USA

dcterms:creator: Xiao Huang
Jundong Li
Xia Hu
dcterms:description: BlogCatalog is a social network dataset where nodes represent users and edges represent following relationships. The features are generated from keywords in each user's description, and the labels are predefined categories of user interests.
dcterms:title: BlogCatalog

dcterms:creator: Xiao Huang
Jundong Li
Xia Hu
dcterms:description: Flickr is a social network dataset where nodes represent users and edges represent following relationships. The features are extracted from user interest tags and the groups that users joined are used as labels.
dcterms:title: Flickr

dcterms:creator: Thomas N. Kipf
Max Welling
dcterms:description: ogbn-arxiv is a large-scale citation network dataset where nodes represent papers and edges represent citations. The dataset is used for node classification tasks.
dcterms:title: ogbn-arxiv
